clyde.name: Clyde
clyde.description: Strong, deep-voiced male narrator with dramatic presence. Ideal for cinematic stories, thriller content, and mystery videos.

benjamin.name: Benjamin
benjamin.description: Clear, articulate narrator. Neutral tone. Educational videos, tutorials, explainers, or motivational content.

grandpa_spuds_oxley.name: Grandpa Spuds Oxley
grandpa_spuds_oxley.description: Warm, grandfatherly storyteller. Childrenâ€™s stories, storytelling.

oracle.name: Oracle
oracle.description: An ethereal, almost mythical narrator. Excellent for fantasy, lore, ancient myths, and dreamlike stories.

autumn_veil.name: Autumn Veil
autumn_veil.description: A gentle, soothing female voice. Best for relaxation videos, bedtime stories, wellness content.

peter.name: Peter
peter.description: A clean, professional-sounding male voice. Great for documentaries, corporate videos, or general narration.

arabelle.name: Arabelle
arabelle.description: A refined, elegant female narrator. Works beautifully for fantasy, storytelling, emotional narration, and poetic scenes.

amelia.name: Amelia
amelia.description: A friendly, upbeat female voice with a conversational style. Perfect for social media content, trendy videos, and upbeat narration.
